snippet: The French carmaker, struggling with a deep slump in sales in crisis-torn Southern Europe, said that it would shut a plant near Paris.
abstract: French carmaker PSA Peugeot Citroen, struggling with a deep slump in sales in Southern Europe, says it will cut 8,000 jobs in France and shut down a plant near Paris.
lead_paragraph: The French carmaker, struggling with a deep slump in sales in crisis-torn Southern Europe, said that it would shut a plant near Paris.

headline.seo: Peugeot to Cut 8,000 Jobs and Close Plant in France
headline.main: Peugeot to Cut 8,000 Jobs and Close Plant in France
headline.print_headline: Peugeot to Cut 8,000 Jobs and Close Plant in France
